value: Bartender needs your permission to manage menu bar items. Follow these steps to grant access:
If the checkbox is disabled, click the 􀎠 and enter your password.
This is how correctly set permissions should look:
Bartender requires accessibility access so that it can:

• Arrange your menu bar items.
• Show and hide menu bar items.
Then in System Settings check Bartender to grant access.

description: Find out why Bartender needs this

value: Bartender requires Screen Recording access on your Mac so that it can:

• Get a list of the menu items in your menu bar to control them. 
• Capture images of menu bar items for display in Settings, Bartender Bar, Search etc.
Then in System Settings check Bartender to grant access.

description: Find out why Bartender needs this
